page.title: 18Anzani House,Felixstowe
page.content: {Anzani House}is a large office block owned by{British Telecom . Research work is carried out there into developing new communicatiom systems. A switchboard has been invented which can handle all the incoming calls worked by only one person and it can show on its screen a directory of all the people and their phone numbers.Some phones are a conbination of computer, calculator and recording machine.To test the phones a special anechoic room is needed which has no echo or sound reverberation.This is done by covering the entire room, even the floor, in foam which absorbs the sound. One of the many laboratories tests and designs new telephones which can look like flowers pots,aeroplanes or cartoon characters.
